text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Bourbon, before you do anythin'. I'm sure you know this already, but this amusement park's meant to be suuper scary, ya know?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: That is understood. However, there is testimony that this amusement park was used as a reference for last year's Halloween party. Therefore, I have concluded that in order for this year's party to succeed, researching this place is necessary.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: This task was unforeseen, and which Uma Musume should be in charge of it was unclear. Therefore, I have decided that I, the chairperson of the preparation committee, should take it on.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: That's it! All you've been sayin' lately is task this task that…!

text_block_list.name: Park Staff
text_block_list.text: Excuse me misses, would you like a commemorative photo? I'm sure I can fit all of you into the frame!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: ! Y-Yes please! Everyone, gather around!

text_block_list.name: Park Staff
text_block_list.text: Great! Everyone, say cheese…

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Wow! This will make for a great memory, won't it. Being here with Tama-chan, Bourbon-chan, Rice-chan, and Rob Roy-chan is so…

text_block_list.name: Park Staff
text_block_list.text: Okay, great smiles from all 6 of you!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Eh…? 6… of us…?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I see. Experiencing paranormal activity is truly terrifying. Therefore, an area in the party meant for taking pictures is a necessity…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Kyuu…

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Rice-san!? Rice-saan!!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Th-This is a roller coaster attraction that was completed just this year! If it stays like this, we can ride it while talking!
lovemelovemelovemelovemelovemelovemelovemelovemelovemeloveme

text_block_list.name: The Group
text_block_list.text: Kyaaa!? Dowaaa!?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I see… Being unable to move, unable to run away is also terrifying.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Everyone, how are you feeling? Are you tired at all? Please make sure to stay hydrated.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Ugh… I need to find a place where Rice-san and Bourbon-san can actually talk to one another…

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Rob Roy-chan… Are you okay?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Huh!? No, I umm… Err, next we'll go… to that haunted house over there!!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Order: accepted.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: There is no escape from this place. The exit is shrouded in darkness. The electric lock is hidden in mystery…

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: It seems as though we have been locked inside…

text_block_list.name: Rob Roy & Rice
text_block_list.text: Eek…!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Hmm… A new mission has been added. That is to unravel the mystery and find the exit.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: H-Hold up, did you hear what that voice said? Electric lock… That must mean there's some kinda machine operatin' it, right?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: If that's the case, I'll take care of it. Just relax here, pretend yer on a huge ship or somethin'.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I refuse. The current situation is a result of our doing, you senpais were merely dragged into our mess. Therefore, I shall take responsibility for this unexpected outcome.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Jeez, yer still tryna treat this like its only yer problem, ain't cha! I told you, you shouldn't try ta do things ya just can't do…

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: To put it simply, escaping from this haunted house is a mission for all of us, right…?

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: I know! Why don't we divide the jobs amongst ourselves? Bourbon-chan, Rice-chan, and I will investigate the right room.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Tama-chan and Rob Roy-chan, you two go investigate the left room. If we split up, I'm sure we can escape from here faster!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Behavior flow has been reset.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: It seems like we need to input some numbers into this door… but the code's prolly in the other room…

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: I'ma go check and see how Bourbon and the others're doin. Rob Roy, you comin'?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: N-No… I…

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Kay…

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Hey, Rob Roy. You look like yer pretty scared too. Why'd ya insist on comin' to such a scary place then?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: That's because… Umm…

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: I wanted Rice-san and Bourbon-san to talk to one another…

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Rice and Bourbon? Didn't they talk ‘bout the weather tho?

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Yes, but Rice-san definitely has something she wants to tell Bourbon-san… I think!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: I read in a magazine that this amusement park is a great way to deepen bonds and have fun conversations. I figured this would be the perfect place for them to say what they needed to say, but…

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Despite us being here, they haven't been able to talk to one another…

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Got it… Don't worry, I'll take care of that too.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Rob Roy, wait here. I'll be sure to convey your feelings to em.

text_block_list.name: Super Creek
text_block_list.text: Ara, Tama-chan. I figured you'd come. That's why I'm standing in your way♪

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Wha-!?
